text: inb4 Mark Ryba says something inspirational

Extension Idea: would be pretty convenient on blog previews "without display options" to have a toggle via the extension (or appended to the sprocket menu) to switch between listing and post views. Right now I think the only way to do that is by manually changing the query string
I like the idea, would need to look into how those query strings work.
I'd think it would be possible, something like parse the querystring and if "blog_listing=true" delete that param and replace with "blog_post=true" or vice versa.
That part seems simple enough, the part that I’m thinking about is how I’d present that button only when it made sense.
Ideally the button should only show up or be enabled. When you’re in the preview page.
